name: Drift 7 Islands (survival)
description:
Drift 7 Islands is a survival game with pixel graph and 2.5D view. At first, it is freeAnd
simple, so players can randomly generate ocean and fragmented islands to survive.

Therefore, players must be extremely careful in every action and carefully calculate the

resources they have. Players must also be cautious towards every creature, who are never

easy to be caught. Eating raw food alone can’t guarantee survival.Version 1.00
  • -Props system

  • -Pet System:primary
